manifestDescription.message: Bring back the SSB mode to FireFox!

uiRequiredIncognito.message: This property requires Incognito Access Permission

uiCreateDesktopFile.message: Create Desktop File for the Website

warningExceedCommandSize.message: Exceeded maximum command size. Please short the URL or Name of Website.

uiDialogDesktopShortcutsDescription.message:
The extension will create desktop shortcuts to access your SSB sites easily.
Desktop shortcuts would be not have execute permission until you give the permission. Downloaded files will not be recognized by the OS until the ".download" file extension in their names is deleted. It's also a security measure that required by Firefox.
